#summary The hr element represents a horizontal rule.
#labels about-html,is-html-element,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *hr element*

== Usage ==

[SpecificationHTML5 HTML 5] says, "The `hr` element represents a paragraph-level thematic break, e.g. a scene change in a story, or a transition to another topic within a section of a reference book."

== Attributes ==

  * [HrAlignAttribute align]
  * [HrClearAttribute clear]
  * [HrColorAttribute color]
  * [HrNoshadeAttribute noshade]
  * [HrSizeAttribute size]
  * [HrWidthAttribute width]
  * [CommonAttributes common attributes]
